thread.title: Inquiry into police commissioners in support of Phiyega to get under way
thread.title_full: Inquiry into police commissioners in support of Phiyega to get under way | News24

author: news24.com
title: Inquiry into police commissioners in support of Phiyega to get under way
text:
Cape Town - Provincial police commissioners, who put their jobs on the line in support of suspended national commissioner Riah Phiyega, would soon know their fate.
On Friday Parliamentâ€™s police committee would start its inquiry into the circumstances that saw the South African Police Service (SAPS) Board of Commissioners (BOC) and top management issue media statement supporting Phiyega in July this year.
The BOC issued a collective statement expressing "serious concern" over what they saw as "an unfair and negative attitude" towards Phiyega.
In the statement, the commissioners said they had "noticed a tendency to reduce everything, especially negative issues relating to policing, to the person of the national commissioner, as if the SAPS is a one-person show".
